1.Prohibited (Haram): Associating partners to Allah (Shirk), asking their help.
1.Lawful (Halal): Worship Allah alone (Tauheed), ask His help.

2.Prohibited (Haram): Considering Angels Daughter of Allah or as Intercessors.
2.Lawful (Halal): Belief in Angels - Gabriel, Michael, Azrael, Israfeel..

3.Prohibited (Haram): Considering human written book as divine book from God.
3.Lawful (Halal): Belief in revealed books -Torah, Zabur, Injeel, Quran.

4.Prohibited (Haram): Worshiping or Asking help from Dead Prophets, Saints or Ancestors. Ascribe Divinity to Prophets. Pretend as Prophet.
4.Lawful (Halal): Belief in All Prophets. Adam, Noah, Abraham, Moses, David, Ezekiel, Jesus, Muhammad.
4.Comments: Final Prophet is Muhammad (Peace be upon him).

5.Prohibited (Haram): Disbelief in the Hereafter (Akhirat). Birth Cycles.
5.Lawful (Halal): Belief in the Day of Judgement, Heaven, Hell.

6.Prohibited (Haram): Associating Partners with Allah. Disbelief in Allah, Angels, Prophets, Books & Hereafter. Hypocrisy.
6.Lawful (Halal): Testimony of Faith in Allah and Muhammad.La ilaha illallah Muhammadur Rasoolullah
6.Comments: Obey Allah and His Messenger.Follow the Quran and the Sunnah1.

7.Prohibited (Haram): Neglecting or Give up Prayers. Laziness & Showoff in Prayers.
7.Lawful (Halal): Fajar, Zuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha. Jummah, Eid.

8.Prohibited (Haram): Give up Zakat. Find reasons to evade Zakat.
8.Lawful (Halal): Zakat on Wealth - Income Gold, Silver, Cattle, Crops.

9.Prohibited (Haram): Not Fasting even with good health.
9.Lawful (Halal): Do Fasting in month of Ramadan Dawn to Dusk.
9.Comments: Do Fast & Recite Quran for Taqwa

10.Prohibited (Haram): Ignoring Hajj when sufficient money available to perform the Hajj Pilgrimage.
10.Lawful (Halal): Performing Hajj at the first opportunity when money is available.
10.Comments: Manasik2 - Tawaf, Saee, Maqam Ibrahim, Arafat.

11.Prohibited (Haram): Disrespect to Parents. Lying, Cheating, Abusing, Backbite. Lewd Acts. Peeping. Slander. Troubling, Disorder, Murder.
11.Lawful (Halal): Respecting the Parents. Care of Spouse, Children.Humble, Being Selfless. Helping, Removing Harm.
11.Comments: Allah accepts Good Deeds for Success. Encourage good, and forbid evil.

12.Prohibited (Haram): Dead Animal, Swine, Blood, Slaughtered without Allah’s name. Predator animals with fangs. Intoxicants. Wine.
12.Lawful (Halal): Vegetables, Fruits, Grains, Cereals. Milk. Egg.Slaughtered with Allah’s name - Camel, Cattle, Sheep, Birds. Fish.
12.Comments: Horses allowed. Donkey was not allowed. Liver is allowed.

13.Prohibited (Haram): Mothers, Daughters, Sisters, Paternal & Maternal Aunts, Nieces (Daughter of Brother or Sister)3. Same Gender, Live-in, Polytheist, Polyandry, Mutah4.
13.Lawful (Halal): Max four wives of faith. If justice cannot be done, then stick to One Wife.Marriage to Women of the People of the Book.
13.Comments: Talaq after three intervals, not three divorces in one say. Khula5 in one say.

14.Prohibited (Haram): Riba - Usury, Taking Interest. Gambling. Hoarding.
14.Lawful (Halal): Buying and Selling. Write Loans with Witnesses.

16.Prohibited (Haram): Trouble people on the road. Evict people from homes.
16.Lawful (Halal): Trust, Promises, Honesty. Safety, Security to People
16.Comments: Trust Allah, People. Praise Allah. Firm.

17.Prohibited (Haram): Prevent Worship, Intellectal, Spiritual, Physical, Social.

18.Prohibited (Haram): Disregard to the teachings of Quran, Hadith, Law of Land.
18.Lawful (Halal): Research in Quran, Hadith, Sciences and Law of Land.

19.Prohibited (Haram): Ignore People’s Welfare. Put Hardship on People, Environs.

20.Prohibited (Haram): Corruption in Administration. Misuse of Resources, Position.
